section.p: You and Luroc make it safely back to Yarimura, where he takes his leave.
‘It’ll go down as one of the greatest stings of all time!’ he boasts. ‘I look forward to working with you again some day.’

p.if: If you took the casket of gems, its contents are worth 850 Shards. Add this amount to your money and cross off the casket.
